    backbone.js

    ReadMore

    Give your JS App some Backbone with Models, Views, Collections, and Events

    Backbone.js ###Backbone.js

    Backbone.js gives structure to web applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing API over a RESTful JSON interface.

    Download backbone.js

    Download backbone.js Introductions

    Download Jquery Introductions

    Download Underscore.js Introductions

    Skeletal Structure or the Matrix of Backbone in index.html + Javascript Library. 

    <!DOCTYPE html>
 <html>
 <head>
<title> Backbone.js </title>
<script src="jquery-1.11.0.min.js"> </script>
<script src="underscore-min.js"> </script><!-- Version 1.6.0 -->
<script src="backbone-min.js"> </script><!-- Version 1.1.1 -->
</head>
<body>

</body>
</html>

    Set Up sails.js - Sails js - Framework

    ReadMore

    sails.js

    Sails.js: ###sails.js

    You need the sudo npm install npmjs.com installer to run sails.js correctly. Go Download it via Commandline type

    You Need also some tools to run Sails js!

    Download npmjs.com

    Download sails.org

    Download lesscss.org

    Download gruntjs.com

    Download node.js

    Download brew.sh

    Open Terminal and Type:

    sudo npm install

    sails lift

    http://localhost:1337/

    info: To see your app, visit http://localhost:1337 info: To shut down Sails, press + C at any time.

    How Install Laravel on Mac Os X - PHP Framework on Xampp + Mamp

    ReadMore

    Laravel Install - The Popular PHP Framework to Code Web Applications.

    Do you need Xampp or Mamp to Install this awesome Framework to build your own Apps. And the Composer to run Laravel correct on your localhost server.

    Get Composer : ###View Application →

    Laravel is a very Fast Popular PHP Framework for develop Web Applications.

    Laravel over Xampp.

    Download Xampp for Mac Os X. →

    Download Laravel. →

    /Applications/XAMPP/ htdocs/L33

    ls

    which php

    /Applications/XAMPP/

    xamppfiles/bin/php

    sudo vi ~/.bash_profile

    password:

    *************

    :wq

    cd

    then back to bash type

    which php

    /Applications/XAMPP/

    xamppfiles/bin/php

    composer install

    wait, it need a bit time.

    find app/storage -type d -exec chmod 777 {} \; find app/storage -type f -exec chmod 777 {} \;

    Install Composer

    Let’s you download and install Composer before You need to install composer software on you OS , you can get from getcomposer.org and follow instruction on website i won’t teah you to install composer , Let’s you do it yourself.

    https://getcomposer.org/

    Get Laravel

    Then download Laravel from github here and place your folder in XAMPP/htdoc

    /Applications/XAMPP/htdoc/{you folder}

    before you install it , you have to check php path that point to

    /Applications/XAMPP/

    xamppfiles/bin/php

    Terminal Bash : cd /Applications/XAMPP/htdocs/L4

    Terminal Command Line :

    sudo vi ~/.bash_profile

    export Path :

    “PATH=/Applications/

    XAMPP/xamppfiles/bin:$PATH”

    If finish use ESC to exit

    Type composer install after you have finish installation go to browser and enter to

    localhost/{your laraval}

    Last problem and solve Boooom!!! you will get a error on your screen , Go to terminal again user both command

    find app/storage -type d -exec chmod 777 {} \; find app/storage -type f -exec chmod 777 {} \; then refresh browser you will get complete to install Laravel , Hope to enjoy it!

    Update

    **Don’t forget restart apache service after set path in ~/.bash_profile

    Laravel over Mamp

    Download Mamp for Mac Os X. →

    Download Laravel. →

    Install Laravel on MAMP !

    install and run Terminal .bash

    type :

    curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php

    type:

    php composer.phar

    type:

    composer

    to exit : type

    clear

    exit

    Open a New Terminal Bash

    type:

    sudo mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer

    type:

    composer

    type to exit :

    clear

    go back to localhost of the index

    localhost/

    localhost:8888/

    Open New Terminal :

    type:

    cd /Applications/MAMP/htdocs/

    ls

    composer create-project laravel/laravel spaceg –prefer-dist

    ls

    rm -R ./*

    ls

    cd ~

    ls - l

    ls -ls

    nano .bash_profile

    export

    PATH=/Applications/MAMP/

    bin/php/PHP_VERSION/bin/:$PATH

    enter the php version

    export

    PATH=/Applications/MAMP/

    bin/php/php5.6.2/bin/:$PATH

    php5.6.2

    ctrl o

    ctrl x

    Open a New Terminal again:=)

    cd /Applications/MAMP/htdocs/

    ls

    composer create-project laravel/laravel/ yourprojectname

    Preload your Localhost and BOOOOMM! The index of your Laravel PHP Framework to build APPS!

    Globally#

    You can place this file anywhere you wish. If you put it in your PATH, you can access it globally. On unixy systems you can even make it executable and invoke it without php.

    You can run these commands to easily access composer from anywhere on your system:

    curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer Note: If the above fails due to permissions, run the mv line again with sudo.

    export

    PATH=/Applications/MAMP/

    bin/php/PHP_VERSION/bin/:$PATH

    <VirtualHost *:80>
DocumentRoot "/Path/To/New/Document/Root"
ServerName spaceg.github.io
<Directory "/Path/To/New/Document/Root">
	Options All
	AllowOverride All
	Order, allow,deny
	Allow from all
</Directory> </ VirtualHost >

    </code>

    January 04, 2015

    Science Medium Jekyll Theme V.0.2.0

    ReadMore

    Science Medium Jekyll Theme

    Download my New Jekyll Theme - Science Medium Theme V.0.2.0

    Theme Preview

    Download Raw Code

    The official Jekyll version of the Clean Blog theme by

    View Live Demo →

    Before You Begin

    In the _config.yml file, the base URL is set to ### _config.yml → which is this themes gh-pages preview. It’s recommended that you remove the base URL before working with this theme locally!

    It should look like this: baseurl: ""

    What’s Included

    A full Jekyll environment is included with this theme. If you have Jekyll installed, simply run jekyll serve in your command line and preview the build in your browser. You can use jekyll serve --watch to watch for changes in the source files as well.

    A Grunt environment is also included. There are a number of tasks it performs like minification of the JavaScript, compiling of the LESS files, adding banners to keep the Apache 2.0 license intact, and watching for changes. Run the grunt default task by entering grunt into your command line which will build the files. You can use grunt watch if you are working on the JavaScript or the LESS.

    You can run jekyll serve --watch and grunt watch at the same time to watch for changes and then build them all at once.

    Download Jekyll ###Download Jekyll →
